name: Yael Acceptic
description:
Yael Acceptic helps companies from the USA, Israel and Western Europe by providing dedicated development teams specifically tailored to your project requirements. Working remotely from our offices in Ukraine, our experts act as a seamless extension of your in-house team.
We take much care to retain and motivate talent, and aim to establish long-term, trustful partnerships with both our customers and professionals.
 
Yael Acceptic in figures:

8 years in business


2 locations: Kyiv and Kharkiv


150+ full-time employees


90,000+ potential team members to select from


Ranked among top 10 Ukrainian IT employers


15–30 working days to launch a fully equipped team of 1+ developer.

 
Areas of expertise:

Web & Mobile Apps


Enterprise solutions


DevOps


Technical Support


Data Science & Machine Learning


Database & Business Intelligence


IoT


AR/VR


Computer Vision


Embedded software


QA.
